item.title: Drone Operator Boca Raton Florida exterior office day and night video shots - Upwork
item.description:
hello
We have a client with a building in Boca Raton. We shot some videos inside their office and they would like to also include some exterior drone footage at both day and night that features the building and the company name on the building.

No editing required, just the raw footage for our video editor to cut into an existing video project.

10 minutes total footage. (5+ minutes during the day and 5+ minutes at night)

Looking to have this done this week. thanks.  Message me for the address and confirm a day that you can shoot during day light and evening hours. At night the company name sign on the building lights up.

Include an example of your exterior building drone footage.

Must be local to Boca Raton, FL.

Hourly Range: $60.00-$80.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 02:34 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Drone, Videography
Skills: Drone, Videography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: 1 min video, 1 headshot, office b-roll & office lifestyle photos - Denver - Upwork
item.description:
We need a local Denver videographer / photographer with proven corporate style production to go to an office on July 8th or 9th at the Galleria at Cherry Creek to:

1. Shoot a 1 minute video where a partner of the accounting firm will describe a service they offer (sound, lighting, video - quality production).

2. Take a headshot photo and lifestyle photo of the partner at the office

3. Take 3 to 5 minutes of b-roll footage around the office and office view

4. Take photos of the office lifestyle (people working, desks, etc -- 10+ photos)

We will also need post-production editing of the 1 minute video. The person will be primarily sitting talking to the camera about their services, with some cutting to some of the office b-roll.

Deliver edited video (we will have an example to share so you can match style of existing 1-minute videos we have for this client), headshot, lifestyle photos and broll.

Share at least 3 work samples of corporate style video and photo -- your actual work.


Budget: $800
Posted On: June 24, 2024 02:26 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Photography, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Photography, Video Production, Videography, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Camera Setup and Operation for Dance Video Shoot - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled camera operator to help us with the setup and operation of 3 Panasonic 4k cameras to ensure the best possible quality for a dance video shoot. Additionally, we need assistance in setting up, balancing, and effectively using a 4th camera on a gimbal. The selected candidate will be responsible for ensuring that all cameras are properly positioned, focused, and calibrated to capture the dancers' movements and expressions accurately. This includes adjusting angles, lighting, and camera settings. Attention to detail and a good eye for composition are essential. The ideal candidate will have experience in camera operation, familiarity with Panasonic 4k cameras, and proficiency in using gimbals.
We are mainly looking for someone to teach us all this, rather than actually shoot the event.

Skills required:

- Camera operation
- Panasonic 4k cameras
- Gimbal operation
- Attention to detail
- Composition
- Lighting

We are located in Jamaica Estates, NY.

Budget: $250
Posted On: June 24, 2024 02:14 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Production, Camera, Video Editing
Skills: Videography, Video Production, Camera, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
